content:
Rabljen, ohranjen, oprema, deluje na vsa omrežja, aluminium silver barve, brezhiben, ....


SPLOŠNE LASTNOSTI APARATA :

2G Omrežje: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G omrežje: HSDPA 850/900/1900/2100
Dimenzije: 137.2x 70.5x 8.7mm
Teža: 135g
Tip  ekrana: Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreem, 16M barv
Velikost: 720 x  1280 pixels. 4.8 inches
- Corning Gorila Glass 2 displey
- Touch-sensitive controls
- Proximitiy sensor for auto turn-off
- Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate
Tip zvonenja: Polifonične, MP3, Vibro zvonenje.
Imenik: Neomejeno, Photocoall
Reža za spominsko kartico: microsd  do 32GB
Spomin aparata: 16/32GB Notranji,1GB RAM
GPRS: DA
EDGE: DA
3G: HSDPA,42 mBPS;HSUPA, 5.76 Mbps
WLAN: Wi Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n,dual-band,Wi-Fi direct,DLNA,Wi-Fi hotspot
Bluetooth: DA, v3.0 A2DP
Infrared portal: NE
USB: DA, v2.0 microUSB
OS: Microsoft Windows Phone 8
- Dual-core 1.5 GHz Krait,Qualcomm MSM8960 Snapdragon,Adreno 225
Sporočila: SMS,EMS, EMAIL,MMS,Email,Push Email,IM
Brskalnik: HTML5
Radio: NE
Igre: DA
Barve: Gray
Fotoaparat: 8 MP, 3264 x 2448 Pixels,autofocus,dual LED flesh,Geo-tagging,image stabilization, Video (1080p@30fps),druga video kamera (1.9MP).

OSTALO:

A-GPS support glonass
3.5mm audio jack
SNS integration
T9
MP3/eAAC+/WMA player
MP4/Divx/Xvid/H.263/H.264/WMV player
Zvočna beleška
Prostoročni pogovor
Organizer
Document viwer/editor
Video/photo editor

Baterija:

Standardna baterija, Li-Ion 2300 mAh
V mirovanju: do 168h (2G)/ do 218h (3G)
Pogovor: do 8h (2G)/ do 14h 50min (3G)

cena 95€  več info zs
author: Susto
